product_name: SportHill Outdoor Shorts - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: From paddleboarding to hiking to rock climbing, the men's SportHill Outdoor Shorts ace summer fun because they stretch, wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection. Lightweight yet tough mini-ripstop polyester/spandex fabric is super stretchy so you move with ease. Durable water repellent finish beads up light rain or paddle splashes so it rolls right off. Waistband has a flat front and elastic back, with 5 belt loops; zipper fly has top button closure. 2 angled front pockets, 1 back zippered pocket. SportHill Outdoor Shorts for men have an 8.5 in. inseam for good coverage. Special buy.
short_description: From paddleboarding to hiking to rock climbing, the men's SportHill Outdoor Shorts ace summer fun because they stretch, wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection.
